import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Form, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap'; let Header = ({search}) => { let [active, setactive] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("scroll", isscroll) }) let isscroll = () => { let header = document.querySelector(".header") if(window.scrollY >= 200) { header.classList.add("active") }else { header.classList.remove("active") } } let onsearch = () => { } return (
setactive(!active)} >
    home MOVIE TV SHOW WEB SERIES PRICING
onsearch(e.traget.value)} placeholder='search for movies'/>
setactive(!active)} className='menu'>
) } export default Header
